node.html:
• Contributing to the design, development, and enhancement of advanced applications using Angular, React, and Node.js. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement new features, conduct rigorous testing, and optimize performance. Leveraging expertise in cloud technologies, database management, and third-party integrations.
  • Collaborated with US-based company Torcue, actively contributing to their in-house projects. Applied Agile methodologies, sprint planning and task division, to ensure efficient development and delivery.
  • Contributed significantly to Alleaves ERP, a US-based comprehensive system featuring 700+ APIs. Focused on enhancing the Point-of-Sale and Delivery modules
  • Played a major role in the rapid end-to-end development of a ticket booking website. The site successfully delivered within 1.5 weeks, and featured PhonePe payment, time slot booking, seamless production deployment, and Automatic QR ticket code generation for the event.

• An offline intensive bootcamp progam where domain experts assign and review our code
  • Write modern, performant, maintainable code for internal projects
  • Work with a variety of different languages, platforms, framework such as JavaScript, TypeScript, Gatsby, React, Node, MongoDB, Postgres, and NextJS
  • Communicate with multi-disciplinary teams of engineers, designers on a daily basis

frontmatter.title: Kmea college of Arts and Science

node.html:
• Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA), Mahatma Gandhi University, 2019-2022
  • Worked on a team to develop a web application using Python Django
  • Programming languages: C, C++, Python, Java, Php
  • Data Structures and Algorithms, Programming Fundamentals, Microprocessors Linux, Networking, Adanced statistical methods, Data Mining, Cloud Computing and System analysis and software engineering
